subject: Horrorfest Paranormal Discussions
author: rasterer
full_text:
Starfest convention in Denver is also host to Horrorfest. Apr 16-18.
Schedule: http://starland.com/wp/?page_id=1519

A few events I see that people here might be interested in:

Sat 7:00 PM
Independent Paranormal  Devil's Advocate  It seems paranormal research is believing in it's own ghosts.  These ghosts are called "theories".  We will discuss several of the most popular "theories" that haunt us today.  Will you believe?

Sat 9:00 PM
Ghosts of Colorado  Join Rocky Mountain Paranormal Research Society as they bring you many of Colorado's best ghost stories, including some of their own.  Stayed tuned following the discussion for a showing of one of their favorite films.

Sun 9:00 AM
Are Aliens Invading Denver? (coffee and donut panel)  Are aliens invading Denver?  The real MIB exposed.  Join Baxter and Bryan in a closer look at claims of aliens living among us and the plans to form a welcoming committee for them.

Sun 2:00 PM
Evidence of the Paranormal? - Rocky Mountain Paranormal examines what is considered proof of the paranormal and whether or not it is actually proof.  Come join the discussion.
